name: fh_iee_trafo_fw_wenig_dez_bio_mod_sani_endenergie
title: Overview of the final energy demand in scenario "Fh IEE Trafo FW" ("Pathways of transformation in the heating sector") with a low proportion of decentralized biomass and a moderate degree of renovation in the building sector
description: This table gives an overview of the final energy demand in Germany in scenario "Fh IEE Trafo FW" ("Pathways of transformation in the heating sector") with a low proportion of decentralized biomass and a moderate degree of renovation in the building sector. It contains the final energy consumption from the electricity, space heating and hot water, industrial processes and transport sectors
keywords: Pathways of transformation in the heating sector

spatial.extent: EU28 without Malta and Cyprus, but with Norway and Switzerland. Focus on Germany

sources.title: Own projection
sources.description: Details see report provided under URL
